snippet.title: Mystery Case Files: Madame Fate
snippet.description:
Mystery Case Files: Madame Fate for PC: http://www.bigfishgames.com/download-games/2230/mystery-case-files-madame-fate/index.html

Mystery Case Files: Madame Fate for Mac: http://www.bigfishgames.com/download-games/2458/mac/mystery-case-files-madame-fate/index.html

Madame Fate, a mysterious fortune teller, has foreseen her own demise at midnight this very day. She has asked for your help in investigating each quirky carnival worker to determine their whereabouts at midnight.

Your investigation will include a multitude of fascinating personalities, from Art the Carny to Lucy the Bearded Beauty, while exploring the magical world of Fate's Carnival.

Each suspect has a motive, but only a Master Detective can discover the secrets hidden within Madame Fate's crystal ball.

  * More areas than ever before!
  * Multiple brain-bending puzzles.
  * Get the Strategy Guide at http://www.bigfishgames.com/download-games/2343/mystery-case-files-madame-fate-strategy-guide/index.html

Visit the Official Mystery Case Files Fan Site at http://www.mysterycasefiles.com

TANATOS, my pet
